item.title: V-Seek: Accelerating LLM Reasoning on Open-hardware Server-class RISC-V Platforms
item.description: V-SEEK accelerates LLM reasoning on open-hardware RISC-V platforms, achieving up to 3.0x speedup through optimized kernels and memory management.
